zeejfps.engine.core

Class Keyboard

  • java.lang.Object
    • zeejfps.engine.core.Keyboard

  • public class Keyboard
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for catching and handling all the events keyEvents on a given canvas and providing easy way to check if a key has been pressed.
    Author:
    Zeejfps

      • NUM_KEYS

        public static int NUM_KEYS

    • Constructor Detail

      • Keyboard

        public Keyboard(Screen screen)
        Parameters:
        screen - the screen on which to listen for keyEvents.

    • Method Detail

      • keyDown

        public boolean keyDown(int keyCode)
        Parameters:
        keyCode - the keyCode of the keyboard key you want to check, use KeyEvent.
        Returns:
        true if the key is currently pressed down.

      • keyReleased

        public boolean keyReleased(int keyCode)
        Parameters:
        keyCode - the keyCode of the keyboard key you want to check, use KeyEvent.
        Returns:
        true if the key has been released.
